5 Cam Thrower

Height 6-3

Weight 190

Class Junior

Hometown Manhattan Beach, Calif.

Highschool Harvard-Westlake

Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

2023-24: (Game-by-Game in PDF) Played in 24 games, making nine starts including four in Ivy League play … Averaged 5.0 points per game with 51 rebounds, 23 assists, seven steals and a blocked shot … Knocked down 24 treys … Had five double-figure scoring games … Dropped a career-high 16 points, hitting four triples, and added three rebounds, three assists and two steals in a win at Dartmouth (2/23) … Followed that up with 1 points at Harvard (2/24) and 15 at home against Cornell (3/1), snaring two boards in both games … Scored 12 points in the season opener against John Jay (11/6), followed it up with nine two nights later against Bucknell (11/8) … Had a career-high six rebounds in both of those contests and dished out a career-high four assists against the Bison … Had 11 points in Penn’s 76-72 win over No. 21 Villanova (11/13) … Scored eight points and grabbed four rebounds in Ivy win over Columbia (3/2).

2022-23: (Game-by-Game in PDF) Saw time in 12 games …Scored 34 points and added 10 rebounds and six assists … Had a 13-point game against Wilkes (12/28), added two rebounds and a steal against the Colonels … Scored six points twice, in a Big 5 game against La Salle (12/3) and an Ivy win at Columbia (1/7) … Also had a season-high three rebounds vs. the Explorers … Scored in each of his first two appearances, against Iona (11/7) and Hartford (11/25) … Also had two assists against the Gaels and two rebounds vs. the Hawks … Knocked down a three-pointer, added two rebounds and an assist in an Ivy win over Brown (2/18) … His other points came against Ivy rival Princeton (1/16).

High School: Four-year letter winner and two-year captain in basketball under head coach David Rebibo … H-W won Mission League championship all four years … McDonald’s All-America nominee … All-state as a senior when he averaged 16.3 points, 3.8 rebounds and 4.0 assists per game … Two-time all-area … Two-time first-team All-Mission League and All-CIF (2020-21, 2021-22) … Averaged 15.5 ppg, 4.5 rpg and 4.5 apg as a junior … Played AAU ball with West Coast Elite (2021) … Honorable mention All-Mission League as a sophomore … Honor Roll student … Spanish National Exam Award recipient … Spanish Honor Society member.

Personal: Son of Michele Barney and Troy Thrower … Younger sister, Grace, is a Duke commit in volleyball … Enrolled in the Wharton School of Business.
